data_sources.description: Simulates a simplified version of blackjack to analyze player's decision-making.

data_variables.description: The total value of the player's cards, considering Aces as either 1 or 11.
The value of the dealer's visible card, used to inform the player's decision.
The number of Aces the player has in their hand, affecting the total value.

data_flow.creation_method: Defined by the user to determine whether to hit or stay based on game state.
data_flow.flow: Used in blackjack.simulate() to evaluate player behavior across multiple games.

data_flow.creation_method: Called with the number of games to simulate the outcomes based on player decisions.
data_flow.flow: Evaluates and averages player's performance over 50,000 games.
